attributes.action: Make it illegal for companies to pass details on to other companies
attributes.additional_details:
It should be Illegal for companies to pass personal details on to other companies full stop. it will help prevent Fraud, help the elderly and hopefully help cut down harassment from these company's scouting for business.

Most people dont realise when signing up for something they are already potentially allowing companies to sell/pass on details

LETS TRY AND PUT A STOP
